    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Ravninsko nihalo kot harmonični oscilator</string>
            <string language="en">Planar pendulum as harmonic oscillator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planares Pendel als harmonischer Oszillator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pendule planaire en tant qu'oscillateur 
harmonique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pêndulo planar como o oscilador harmonic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pendolo planare come oscillatore armonico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίπεδο εκκρεμές ως αρμονικό ταλαντωτή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Péndulo planar como oscilador armónico</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Povezava med harmoničnim in ravninskim nihanjem pri majhnim odklonskih kotih.</string>
            <string language="en">Relation between harmonic oscillator and planar pendulum when using small angle of displacement.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ravninsko nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">planar pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">harmonično nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">harmonic pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kot odmika</string>
            <string language="en">angle of displacement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relation zwischen harmonischem Oszillator und 
planarem Pendel, wenn kleiner Winkel der Distanzadresse verwendet 
wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Relation entre l'oscillateur harmonique et le 
pendule planaire en utilisant le petit angle du déplacement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relação entre o oscilador harmonic e o pêndulo
planar ao usar o ângulo pequeno do deslocamento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rapporto fra l'oscillatore armonico ed il pendolo
planare quando usando piccolo angolo di spostamento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέση μεταξύ του αρμονικού ταλαντωτή και του 
επίπεδου εκκρεμούς κατά χρησιμοποίηση της μικρής γωνίας της 
μετατόπισης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Relación entre el oscilador armónico y el 
péndulo planar al usar el ángulo pequeño de la dislocación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">planares Pendel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">harmonisches Pendel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkel der Distanzadresse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">angle de déplacement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pêndulo planar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pêndulo harmonic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo do deslocamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρμονικό εκκρεμές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γωνία της μετατόπισης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
